full_summary:
**RFP: Antennas System Maintenance and Support Services**
==============================================

**Title:**
Operation and Maintenance of Antenna Systems for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)

**Reference Number:** PW-__HN-467-81391
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Tender Number:** M7594-210775/A
**Publication Date:** September 16, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** November 10, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

**Background:**
In support of the RCMP's strategic national communications infrastructure, the "Maintenances and Support Services (M&MS) of the UHF, VHF, HF, Microwave and Satellite Antenna Systems" are to be undertaken. This RFP invites proposals from capable suppliers to assist the RCMP in delivering these essential services across Canada.

**Scope of Work:**
The scope of this RFP includes but is not limited to:
* Repair, maintenance, calibration and testing of antenna systems and related structures
* Installation, dismantlement, packaging and modification of antenna systems and related cabling
* Provision of engineering, technical instruction, and support to RCMP personnel

**Request for Proposal (RFP):**
The RFP is open to all interested suppliers. Bidders are invited to submit proposals outlining the scope of work, timeline, and methodology. The successful bidder will be awarded a contract for a three-year period with the option to extend for an additional four years.

**Key Requirements:**
* CFTA / CPTPP trade agreements
* Competitive procurement strategy
* Lowest/Lower Bid evaluation criteria

**How to Respond:**
Submit proposals in electronic format to [Robert Dubé](mailto:robert.dube@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) by the closing date. All documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. ... paidResources: ...**

Let me know if you need any further assistance. 
Best regards, [Your Name]
Technical Writer.
